text: Kabaka w’e Bwasuli n’ategeezebwa nti, “Amawanga ge watwala n’obateeka mu bibuga bya Samaliya tebamanyi tteeka lya Katonda w’ensi eyo,17:26 Kabona oyo eyaliwo mu biseera ebyo, y’omu ku bakabona ab’ennyana eya zaabu Yerobowaamu gye yabumbisa (1Bk 12:31) kyeyavudde abasindikira empologoma okubatta, kubanga tebamanyi Katonda w’ensi kye yeetaaga.”
